title: Blog #1 - Hello world!
content:
Hello! My name is Avi Rana! I am computer science student. I try to make cool stuff in my freetime. I like web dev and am somewhat into game dev.

I am a 20 year old budding software developer interested in all things tech. I enjoy working on creative projects which make me think outside the box. A fast, hands-on learner, I am passionate about the work I do and the impact I can make on a product.

I'm gonna be talking about my projects and cool stuff that I come across in these blogs!!!

Connect with me
Github
Twitter
LinkedIn
Email

title: Avi's movie list
byline: A list of all the cool movies I have watched and would recommend!
content:
A list of all the cools movies and shows that I would recommend. This list is not in any particular order:-

  • Demolition - a movie about a man who is trying to process his wife's death.
  • Rockstar - a love movie fun of twists.
  • Avatar - a movie with crazy good world building.
  • Taare Zameen Par

title: Turning 21
byline: Life update for completing possibly 1/3 of my life.
content:
I just turned 21 a few days back and I want to write what I like right now and what's happening in my life so future me can look back at this stuff.

LIFE UPDATE
Started an internship, moved to Pune, im trying to be social and trying not to get overwhelmed by everything. My goals right now are: getting fit, doing well at my internship/job, learning to draw.

MUSIC
I AM MUSIC




GAMES
Cool games that I like.
